EmailTemplate.name: Step Forward test email
EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward - Test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Interview Preparation: The Video
We can start typing anything we want. Test test test! Edit within the template....now start editing the information within the email. Say we want to update text.
From here, add all your new text for your new email template.
Interview Preparation: The Video
Interviews will be happening over the next few months and we'll be in touch when you've been matched with your employers. Until then it's up to you to practise, practise, practise.
New Text!!
Good luck!
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
